children.text: The perp joints in this section of brickwork not been constructed to align vertically.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 3.13 Vertical alignment of perpend joints states that
‘A line of masonry perpends is defective if it exceeds a maximum deviation from vertical alignment of 20mm per 2m height of wall, measured from centre to centre of perpend joints’.
This area of the brickwork will need to be reconstructed in accordance with above.
